summary: DRAGONBORN SPOILERS: Craft more throwing spiders! Get more albino spider pods in a lore-friendly and immersive way.
descriptionHtml:
DRAGONBORN SPOILERS:
Craft more throwing spiders! Get more albino spider pods in a lore-friendly and immersive way. No more waiting for that single regenerating outdoors spider pod in the vanilla game!

This modifies the Mind Control Spiders so that they lay additional spider pods in their victims. Go forth and raise your spider army!

INSTALLATION:
Copy MoreAlbinoSpiders.esp file and Scripts folder into your Skyrim Data folder.
author: Esca
